ability.Iron Hide: Reduces damage taken from Physical moves by 25%.
ability.Horn Charge: Increases the user's Attack by 1 stage when hitting the target with a Physical move.

Horn Smash.effect: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.

Steel Guard.effect: Increases the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage each.

Groundquake.effect: Has a 20% chance to cause the target to flinch.

Armored Strike.effect: The user gains a temporary shield that absorbs 1/4 of the damage taken in the next turn.
